name: Reel Fishing Pocket 2: Ocean
description:
Natsume dips its toe into the water for a sequel to the popular iOS game Reel Fishing Pocket with Reel Fishing Pocket 2: Ocean!

This time, you'll be catching ocean-based fish such as mackerel, sea bass, and bluefin tuna!

▶Become a Fishing Master!
Learn important fishing tips from the Fishing Master as you strive to become a top ranked fisherman!

▶Legendary Fish!
The water around the Aqua Lodge is known for massive fish. However there are mysterious “Legendary Fish” as well; the kind that are only whispered about in fish tales. No one has seen one, let alone caught one. Land one, and you’ll be sure to earn a Fishing Master title!

▶80+ Missions & 20 Realistic Salt Water Fish!
Set off on a once-in-a-lifetime journey as you strive to become a legendary fisherman. Catch a variety of saltwater fish that look and act like the real thing!

▶Action-Packed Fish Fights!
It will take perfect timing and a keen sense to land these monster fish! But don’t worry if you are just starting out; easy to use tutorials and a handy fishing gauge will help you along. This is the most fun you can have fishing without putting on your waders!

▶Tackle For the Right Occasion!
The Target Fish System allows you to select the fish you want to catch, and the best rod and tackle will be automatically selected for you! However, independent-minded fishermen will want to choose for themselves from the large variety of bait and lures!

▶Scratchers, Anyone?
You earn points every time you catch a fish or complete a mission. Use these valuable points to purchase scratchers! If you’re lucky, you may be able to win a rare rod!

------------------
Recommended Devices
- iPhone 5 or later
- iPod Touch 5th generation or later
- iPad Retina or later
* Reel Fishing Pocket Ocean 2 is optimized for any iPad Retina or later with superb graphical presentation.
